tool_description: Applies audio effects including reverb, delay, EQ, compression, and distortion to enhance musical tracks.

effect_type.description: Effect type: reverb, delay, eq, compression, distortion, chorus, flanger, phaser

frequency_range.description: Frequency range: low, mid, high, full

error_messages: Unknown effect type: Choose from reverb, delay, eq, compression, distortion, chorus, flanger, phaser
Invalid intensity value: Must be between 0.0-1.0
Invalid mix level: Must be between 0.0-1.0
Invalid frequency range: Choose low, mid, high, or full
usage: Specify effect type, optionally set intensity, mix level, and frequency range. Returns processed audio configuration.
